remarks: The multiplication operation of a unital ring has (one or more) identity elements.  (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ringi.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
ringi.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
ringi.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
rngoid $p |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> E. u e. X ( ( u H A ) = A /\ ( A H u ) = A ) ) $.
$d A u $.
$d G u $.
$d H u $.
$d R u $.
$d X u $.
